title: The Krays and Me
description: Two names reigned supreme in London's underworld in the 1960s—Ronnie and Reggie Kray, also known as the Kray twins—and it wasn't until 1969 that they were apprehended for murder. Charlie Bronson met the Kray twins in prison and eventually became a trusted friend. Here he tells the inside story of the infamous duo and sets the record straight once and for all.
author: Charles Bronson
